category.text: $course$/vufgb-correlation-001-en-wooclap/Descriptive statistics/Summary Statistics/Bivariate statistics/Correlation, Inferential Statistics/Regression, Inferential Statistics/Regression/Simple linear regression, Inferential Statistics/Regression/Equation

questiontext.text: In a particular study with 100 participants, the sample mean of X is 75 with a standard deviation of 5.8. Moreover, the sample mean of Y is 50 with a standard deviation of 2.4. The estimated regression equation is: Yâ€™ = 17.8 - 0.26X. What is the (Pearson) correlation coefficient for the association between X and Y?
